desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches up to four attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Interrupt Level is increased during this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches up to four attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt Level is increased during this skill.

desc.0: While not in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state and with at least 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Deals <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> to nearby enemies, then enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state.

desc.0: While not in combat and with more than 50% HP and less than 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Banyue consumes HP to recover <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>. Upon reaching 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, Banyue immediately enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state.
desc.2: Upon entering the battlefield, gain one chance to use this skill. In Investigation Zone mode, this effect can trigger once per 180s.
desc.3: HP consumption will at most reduce Banyue's HP to 50% of Max HP.

desc.0: When Banyue is in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, hold <IconNormal /> to consume 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> and activate:
desc.1: Banyue hurls a massive mountain at the enemy, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this move, Banyue exits the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: While Banyue is in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state and after performing two different <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> through Basic Attack branches or quick input commands, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Banyue launches his beads forward to imprison enemies, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Banyue automatically follows up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: While attacking, press <IconEvade /> without moving the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to activate:
desc.1: Banyue enters a defensive stance. If attacked during this time, he parries the enemy's attack and accumulates Daze.
desc.2: If attacked at the exact moment the skill is activated, a Perfect Block occurs.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable during a successful parry.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Rotate the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} in a half-circle and press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: Dodges backward and taunts enemies.
desc.2: After any <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Battle Cry</ct> and quickly execute the required inputs during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Battle Cry</ct> to then follow up with the corresponding <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: During a dodge, press <IconNormal />, or during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Battle Cry</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches beads forward, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can be followed up with the 2nd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Towering Peaks</ct> or the 2nd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Majestic Summit</ct>.

desc.0: After a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> is triggered through <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Overcome Peaks</ct>, press <IconNormal />, or after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> is triggered though <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Battle Cry</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches a forward attack that deals <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can be chained into the 3rd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Towering Peaks</ct> or the 3rd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Majestic Summit</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: After the 3rd or 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Majestic Summit</ct>, press <IconNormal /> to activate:

desc.4: Banyue throws out his beads, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.5: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Adrenaline, can be activated in one of two ways:
desc.1: After the 1st or 2nd hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Towering Peaks</ct>, press <IconSpecialReadyRp /> to activate:
desc.2: During an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Immolate</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, quickly input <IconNormal /> <IconNormal /> <IconSpecialReadyRp /> in sequence to activate:
desc.3: Banyue sends out a sonic wave forward, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Interrupting an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after its Perfect Interrupt window will not affect the interrupted <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>'s effect. Interrupting an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> during the Perfect Interrupt window is equal to triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Cancel</ct>.
desc.1: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state and with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Cancel</ct> is easier to trigger.

desc.1: Launches a large area attack in front, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: If Banyue has more than 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, he automatically enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state after the attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Launches a large area attack in front, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: One With the Mountains

desc.0: Banyue gains extra Sheer Force based on his Max HP, with every 1 point of Max HP increasing his Sheer Force by 0.1.
desc.1: All <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> Banyue deals is Sheer DMG, ignoring enemy DEF and using his Sheer Force stat as the DMG Multiplier.
desc.2: When Banyue enters the battlefield, he immediately recovers 60 Adrenaline. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can trigger once every 180s.
desc.3: Banyue can recover <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> through the following methods:
desc.4: Recover 0.5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> for every point of Adrenaline consumed;
desc.5: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> upon activating <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>;
desc.6: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> when parrying an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Immovable Mountain</ct>, and recover 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> instead upon triggering a Perfect Block, up to once every 1s;
desc.7: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> upon triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, up to once every 1s.
desc.8: Banyue can have up to 150 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>. When he possesses at least 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, Banyue can enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state by using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Immolate</ct>. While in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, Banyue can no longer gain <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>. After Banyue uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct>, he exits the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state.
desc.9: When entering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, Banyue gains 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>. If Banyue has <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>, launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> no longer consumes Adrenaline, instead consuming 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> and restoring 10 Adrenaline. Upon exiting the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, remove all <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>.
desc.10: When possessing <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, hold <IconSpecial /> to launch four different <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct> in a fixed sequence.
desc.11: When Banyue uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, he increases his Sheer Force by <ct color=#2BAD00>150</ct>, <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>18%</ct>, and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>18%</ct> for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

desc.5: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> upon activating <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>;
desc.6: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> when parrying an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Immovable Mountain</ct>, and recover 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> instead upon triggering a Perfect Block, up to once every 1s;
desc.7: Recover 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct> upon triggering a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct>, up to once every 1s.
desc.8: Banyue can have up to 150 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>. When he possesses at least 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>, Banyue can enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state by using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Immolate</ct>. While in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, Banyue can no longer gain <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wrathful Fires</ct>. After Banyue uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct>, he exits the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state.
desc.9: When entering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, Banyue gains 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>. If Banyue has <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>, launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> no longer consumes Adrenaline, instead consuming 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> and restoring 10 Adrenaline. Upon exiting the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, remove all <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct>.
desc.10: When possessing <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, hold <IconSpecial /> to launch four different <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct> in a fixed sequence.
desc.11: When Banyue uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, he increases his Sheer Force by <ct color=#2BAD00>275</ct>, <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>33%</ct>, and CRIT DMG by <ct color=#2BAD00>33%</ct> for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

desc.2: When Banyue enters the battlefield, he immediately recovers 60 Adrenaline. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can trigger once every 180s.

desc.1: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, when Banyue consumes <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> to unleash an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> through a Basic Attack branch or quick input commands, he gains one stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vidyaraja</ct>. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vidyaraja</ct> increases his <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> by 5%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 8s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.name: Greed Burns Like Fire
1.desc: When Banyue hits an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: One's Path</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Earth Shaker</ct>, he inflicts the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremor</ct> state. In this state, enemies' <ct color=#FF5521>Fire RES</ct> is reduced by 10%, lasting 30s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Lion's Roar</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Lion's Roar - Wrath</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Mountain Tremor</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Mountain Tremor - Wrath</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Crushing Peaks</ct> hits an enemy in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tremor</ct> state, the Sheer DMG dealt is increased by 10%. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Crushing Peaks</ct> hits a Stunned enemy, the current Stun duration is extended by 2s. This effect can only trigger once per Stun and does not stack with similar effects.

flavor.0: Did Banyue Shifu ever have any desires of his own? He runs a martial arts school in Failume Heights, apparently only because a certain grandmaster once suggested he open one.
flavor.1: The school doesn't even have a name, he isn't looking for fame for fortune, and he's never once told his students to shout slogans about passing down his art.
flavor.2: Only Banyue Shifu himself knows that the obsession called repentance burns that iron heart, day and night. A single mistake could send him spiralling.
flavor.4: "Greed is like fire. When kept in check, it lights the way forward, but left unchecked, it burns you instead."

2.name: Anger Cuts Like a Blade
2.desc: The CRIT DMG bonus from the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive</ct> is increased by an additional 15%, and the <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> bonus is increased by an additional 15%. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Visage of Wrath</ct> state, Banyue restores an additional 5 Adrenaline when consuming <ct color=#FFFFFF>Mountain's Might</ct> to unleash an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>.

flavor.0: The students at the martial arts school had never seen Banyue Shifu lose his temper, let alone fly into a rage. Even with the dullest or most reckless students, he seemed endlessly patient. After all, how could a mountain ever grow angry? Its deep, immovable calm makes people almost forget the fury it can hold.
flavor.1: But when it stirs with the wrath of the heavens, even the fiercest of beasts will tremble in fear.
flavor.3: "Anger is like a blade — keep it sheathed in daily life, lest it wound those around you."

3.name: Ignorance Binds Like Chains
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Banyue Shifu was not just a warrior, but a wise man — or so said both his students and the neighbors who knew him.
flavor.1: After all, he always looked so composed and thoughtful. Though he spoke little, every word that left his mouth sounded like a proverb worth pondering.
flavor.2: Martial arts, he often said, are not only a way to train the body but also the heart. And as he would always add, he himself was still just a student.
flavor.4: "I, Banyue, have been slow and foolish, once straying from the right path. But to clear the way for you on this journey... these fists are still yours to command."

4.name: Purge Unit - Type Zero
4.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Lion's Roar - Wrath</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Mountain Tremor - Wrath</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Toppling Mountain</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Crushing Peaks</ct> DMG increase by <ct color=#FFFFFF>30%</ct>.

flavor.0: Fate may be ordained by the heavens or shaped by human hands. Yet for some, destiny and guilt were never granted the mercy of free will.
flavor.1: Before ever having a name, the combat construct known as "Type Zero" was, in the truest sense, nothing more than a killing machine.
flavor.2: And when did a "heart" form? Was it the day she erased the chains of his code, or the moment he found the courage to carry it all and keep moving forward?
flavor.4: "Repentance is too easy. Rather than fleeing from past sins, shoulder the mountain of your past... and throw a punch."

5.name: Student
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Did you hear? There's a martial arts school up in the mountain taught by some big construct.
flavor.1: The students there are no joke; they can even hold their own against Ethereals.
flavor.2: Their iron-bodied Shifu often heads into the Hollows to help with rescues, too. Must be quite the martial arts master, huh?
flavor.4: "I'm still just a clumsy student myself... Though you all call me 'Shifu,' it's you who have taught me what it means to be a person."

6.name: Descended Vidyaraja
6.desc: At any time, when Banyue uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, he also gains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vidyaraja</ct>. The <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> bonus from <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vidyaraja</ct> is increased by an additional 8%, and its duration is extended to 30s. When activating <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Crushing Peaks</ct>, Banyue deals <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> equal to 600% of his Sheer Force to nearby enemies. Using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge: Battle Cry</ct> immediately after an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> also grants <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vidyaraja</ct>.

flavor.0: "Dying's the easy way out, isn't it, big guy? You've still got a long path of redemption ahead of you!"
flavor.2: Her frame was delicate, yet her words landed with a weight that seemed to cut through a mountain of burden and doubt.
flavor.4: "I still question whether I have the wisdom and courage to judge... but that's no excuse to stop moving forward."
